plays.text: Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Crosschecking Josh Green
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Dan Cleary and Mike Comrie
Penalty to Brent Gilchrist 2 minutes for Tripping Georges Laraque
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Comrie
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Roughing Eric Brewer
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for Roughing Kris Draper
Penalty to Josh Green 2 minutes for High Sticking Brett Hull
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Holding Kris Draper
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Holding Georges Laraque
Penalty to Sean Brown 2 minutes for Tripping Kirk Maltby
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Nicklas Lidstrom
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Dan Cleary
